summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6277 for the improvement of 30th Ave. South from South Dawson St. to South Ferdinand St.; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91896, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
